entry.title: [QT] Feature proposal: Displaying current Units/Changing Units with status bar control.
entry.summary: Angel has shared an update regarding the addition of features to a project. The update includes showing the current unit on the header column title "Amount ($unitHere)" and adding a confirmation dialog to prevent users from changing the current unit of display by mistake. Angel thanks everyone for their feedback. Gregory Maxwell suggests that if a global setting is added in the status bar, it should be done in a way where it's impossible for a stray keypress to switch it.
